text: Waiting for the Sea () is a 2012 Russian Ukrainian Belgian French Kazakhstani German Tajik drama movie directed by Bakhtyar Khudojnazarov and starring Egor Beroev, Anastasiya Mikulchina, Detlev Buck, Dinmukhamet Akhimov. == Other websites == * Category:2012 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Ukrainian movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Kazakhstani movies Category:German drama movies Category:Tajik movies Category:Movies directed by Bakhtyar Khudojnazarov
title: Waiting for the Sea
